Landgren
Emma Olsson Sandqvist

Born: December 31, 1889 (1, 2, 3)

Birthplace: No. 7 Qvarnby, Södra Sallerup, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1)

Baptised: January 6, 1890 (1)

Baptismal Place: No. 7 Qvarnby, Södra Sallerup, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1)

Mother: Anna Nilsdotter (1)

Father: Jöns Olsson Landqvist (1)

Husband: Nils Peter Landgren (3, 6, 9, 7)

Married: May 1, 1907 (3)

Marriage Place: Tullstorp 4, Södra Sallerup, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (3)

Direct Descendant: Erick Landgren (6)

Death: August 16, 1949 (8, 10)

Death Place: Rockford, Winnebago County, Illinois (10, 11)

Burial Place: Scandinavian Cemetery, Rockford, Winnebago County, Illinois (11)

Immigration Records

Last Premanent Residence: S. Sallerup, Sweden (4)

Nearest Relative or Friend in Country Whence Alien Came: Grandfather - Kvarnby, Sweden (4)

Departure Date: January 27, 1914 (5)

Port of Departure 01: Malmö, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (5)

Ship Name 01: Öresundsångare (5)

Port of Departure 02: Liverpool, England (4)

Ship Name 02: Lusitania (4)

Arrival Date: February 6, 1914 (4)

Port of Arrival 02: New York, New York (4)

Final Destination: Winnebago County, Illinois (4, 5)
